name: @perkycrow/perky
description: A modular framework for JavaScript game development

scripts.dev:serve: vite build --config vite.examples.config.js && vite preview --config vite.examples.config.js
scripts.den:deploy: vite build --config vite.den.config.js && rm -rf ../perkycrow_com/public/den && cp -r dist/den ../perkycrow_com/public/den
scripts.den:serve: vite build --config vite.den.config.js && vite preview --config vite.den.config.js
scripts.ghast:serve: vite build --config vite.ghast.config.js && vite preview --config vite.ghast.config.js
scripts.ghast:deploy: vite build --config vite.ghast.config.js && rm -rf ../perkycrow_com/public/ghast && cp -r dist/ghast ../perkycrow_com/public/ghast
scripts.ci: vitest run && node scripts/cleaner.js --audit --fix && node scripts/cleaner.js --coverage
scripts.doc:build: yarn doc:update && vite build --config vite.doc.config.js && node doc/generate_pages.js

author: PerkyCrow <contact@perkycrow.com>
